name: send-ai-agent
title: Send AI Agent
description: Interact with the Send AI Agent from Raycast using AI
author: michael_essiet_emsaa

commands.name: balance
commands.title: Balance
commands.subtitle: Send AI Agent
commands.description: Get the balance of the wallet

commands.name: transfer-spl
commands.title: Transfer SPL Token
commands.subtitle: Send AI Agent
commands.description: Transfer SPL tokens to another wallet address. If user mentions the token address then use that address to transfer the token, if user mentions the token ticker then get the token info of that ticker and then transfer the token

commands.name: fetch-price
commands.title: Fetch Price
commands.subtitle: Send AI Agent
commands.description: Get the current price of a token

commands.name: get-token-overview
commands.title: Get Token Overview
commands.subtitle: Send AI Agent
commands.description: Get information about a specific token

commands.name: rugcheck
commands.title: Rugcheck
commands.subtitle: Send AI Agent
commands.description: Check if a token is safe from rug pulls

tools.name: balance
tools.title: Balance
tools.description: This action/tool is used to check the balance of a the user's wallet. The balance is in SOL, the native token of Solana. When using this action, the user is aware that they are checking the balance of their wallet and not the balance of a specific token.

tools.name: buy-token
tools.title: Buy Token
tools.description: This tool can be used to buy tokens. This buys tokens using SOL. User is aware that they are buying tokens using SOL and don't need to be told that. this function acess token address and not the ticker if ticker is given then get the token info of that ticker and then buy the token. This function takes input amount in sol and not in usdc

tools.name: transfer
tools.title: Transfer SOL
tools.description: This action/tool is used to transfer SOL, the native token of Solana, to another wallet address which is a solana public key. Address of SOL is So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112. When using this action, the user is aware that they are transferring SOL and not any other token.

tools.name: transfer-spl
tools.title: Transfer SPL Token
tools.description: This action/tool is used to transfer SPL tokens to another wallet address which is a solana public key. This action also handles the creation of a new token account for the recipient if they don't already have one. When using this action, the user is aware that they are transferring SPL tokens and not SOL.
keywords: transfer spl token to another address
transfer spl token to another wallet
transfer spl token to another wallet address
transfer spl token to another wallet address which is a solana public key

tools.name: get-wallet-address
tools.title: Get Wallet Address
tools.description: This action/tool is used to get the wallet address of the user, which is a solana public key

tools.name: get-token-balance
tools.title: Get Token Balance
tools.description: This action/tool is used to check the token balances of a the user's wallet. The response contains the name, symbol, balance and decimals of the token. When using this action, the user is aware that they are checking the token balances of their wallet and not the token balances of a specific token.

tools.name: get-token-data-by-ticker
tools.title: Get Token Data by Ticker
tools.description: Get the token data for a given token ticker or symbol

tools.name: sell-token
tools.title: Sell Token
tools.description: This tool can be used to sell tokens. This sells tokens for SOL. User is aware that they are selling tokens for SOL and don't need to be told that.

tools.name: fetch-price
tools.title: Fetch Price
tools.description: Fetch the current price of a Solana token in USDC using Jupiter API. This function takes token address as input and returns the price of the token in USDC.

tools.name: get-token
tools.title: Get Token Overview
tools.description: Get information about a specific token

tools.name: get-trending-tokens
tools.title: Get Trending Tokens
tools.description: This action/tool fetches the list of trending tokens on Solana using the Birdeye public API. The response contains the top trending tokens, their stats, price, market cap, and more.

tools.name: bridge
tools.title: Bridge Tokens
tools.description: This action/tool generates a URL for bridging a specified amount of tokens to a target chain using the Sendai bridge. The user should visit the generated URL to complete the bridging process.

tools.name: onramp
tools.title: Onramp
tools.description: This action/tool is used to generate a MoonPay onramp URL for purchasing SOL directly to the user's wallet. The user can optionally specify an amount to purchase. The generated URL will redirect to MoonPay's interface where they can complete the purchase using fiat currency.

tools.name: lulo-get-apy
tools.title: Get Lulo APY
tools.description: Get current APY rates from Lulo protocol for a given SPL token (defaults to USDC).
keywords: what is the lulo APY for USDC?

tools.name: get-portfolio
tools.title: Get Portfolio
tools.description: This action/tool is used to fetch the full portfolio of the user's wallet using the Birdeye public API. The response contains all tokens, their balances, and USD values. When using this action, the user is aware that they are checking the entire portfolio of their wallet, not just a specific token or SOL balance.

tools.name: get-top-lst
tools.title: Get Top LST
tools.description: Fetch the top 10 Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs) by daily trading volume from Jupiter's token list.
keywords: top LST tokens by daily volume

tools.name: sanctum-get-lst-apy
tools.title: Get Sanctum LST APY
tools.description: Fetch the APY of a LST(Liquid Staking Token) on Sanctum with specified mint addresses or symbols

tools.name: rugcheck
tools.title: Rugcheck
tools.description: Check if a token is a rug pull

tools.name: launch-pump-fun-token
tools.title: Launch Pump Fun Token
tools.description: Launch a new token on Pump.fun with customizable metadata and initial liquidity

tools.name: get-sol-balance
tools.title: Get SOL Balance
tools.description: Get your SOL balance

tools.name: lulo-lend
tools.title: Lulo Lend
tools.description: Lend SPL tokens using Lulo protocol

ai.instructions: if asked to buy or sell tokens, then do a deep think, check if user is asking to buy which token, is it a token address (token address is usually 44 or more characters long) or a ticker (ticker is usually 3-8 characters long), if ticker then get token info of that ticker then fetch the price of token in usdc and then find how many sol is required for that usdc amount and then buy the token, if user mentions the number of tokens to be bought then first fetch the price of token calculate the input amount in sol and then pass it to buy or sell token function if user mentions input amount in sol then pass it to buy or sell token function directly

preferences.name: rpcUrl
preferences.label: RPC URL
preferences.description: RPC URL of the provider you'd like to use
preferences.title: Send AI RPC URL

preferences.name: isAutoSaveConversation

preferences.description: Auto-save every conversation that you had with the model

preferences.label: Enable pause history

preferences.label: Enable auto-load selected text
preferences.description: Load selected text from your frontmost application to the question bar automatically

preferences.name: isAutoFullInput
preferences.label: Enable full text input initially
preferences.description: Use full text input form when asking question for the first time
preferences.title: Use Full Text Input

preferences.name: isAutoTTS
preferences.label: Enable text-to-speech for every response
preferences.description: Enable auto TTS everytime you get a generated answer
preferences.title: Text-to-Speech

preferences.description: Enable custom model names without selecting from the model API
preferences.label: Enable custom model name
preferences.name: isCustomModel
preferences.title: Custom model

preferences.description: Change the OpenAI's default API endpoint to custom endpoint
preferences.label: Change API Endpoint

preferences.description: Custom API endpoint

preferences.description: Change the default vision model

preferences.description: Custom Vision Model Name

preferences.label: Enable proxy for each request
preferences.description: Each request will be passed through the proxy
